common

Class AbstractImageParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.AbstractImageParser
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HeifParser, JpgParser, PngParser, TifParser, WebpParser

    public abstract class AbstractImageParser
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract superclass for implementing image file parsers. Subclasses are responsible for decoding specific image formats, for example: JPEG, PNG, TIFF, etc and extracting metadata structures.

    This class provides basic file loading and byte-reading utilities, and defines a contract for reading metadata through abstract methods.

    Usage:

    • Subclass this to support format-specific parsing
    • Use readMetadata() to trigger extraction

    Example 

     AbstractImageParser parser = new JpgParser(Paths.get("image.jpg"));
 parser.readMetadata();
    Since:
    13 August 2025
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Trevor Maggs

        public AbstractImageParser(java.nio.file.Path fpath)
                    throws java.nio.file.NoSuchFileException
        Constructs an image parser.
        Parameters:
        fpath - the path to the image file to be parsed
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the specified Path object is null
        java.nio.file.NoSuchFileException - if the file is not a regular type or does not exist

      • formatDiagnosticString

        public java.lang.String formatDiagnosticString()
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Produces a human-readable debug string summarising the basic file attributes. Useful for logging or diagnostic output.
        Returns:
        A formatted string containing file path, creation time, last access time, last modified time, and image format
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there is an I/O error

      • getImageFormat

        public abstract DigitalSignature getImageFormat()
        Returns the detected image format, such as TIFF, PNG, or JPG.
        Returns:
        a DigitalSignature enum constant representing the image format

      • readMetadata

        public abstract boolean readMetadata()
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Reads and extracts metadata from the image file.
        Returns:
        true once metadata has been parsed successfully, otherwise false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if a file reading error occurs during the parsing

      • getMetadata

        public abstract MetadataStrategy<?> getMetadata()
        Retrieves the extracted metadata from the provided image file.
        Returns:
        a MetadataStrategy object
